summary: Completed comprehensive testing of KAYICOM Wallet improvements including new text-based purple gradient logo, dark/light mode toggle, dashboard with 5 quick actions including Swap, separate swap rates in admin, card withdrawal fees by limit, admin client management, and Haitian Creole translations. All specified features are working correctly.
passed_tests: New KAYICOM text-based logo with purple gradient (no background image) - visible in header and wallet cards
Dark/Light mode toggle working - HTML class 'dark' applied correctly when toggled
Dashboard has 5 quick action buttons: Depoze (green), Retire (orange), Swap (purple), Voye (yellow), Kat (black)
Copy Client ID button functionality working (KCADMIN001 with copy icon)
GET /api/exchange-rates returns swap_htg_to_usd (0.0074) and swap_usd_to_htg (132.0)
PUT /api/admin/exchange-rates accepts swap rates - 200 OK response
GET /api/admin/card-fees endpoint - 200 OK response with empty fees array
POST /api/admin/card-fees creates card fee by limit (min: 0, max: 100, fee: 5) - 200 OK
DELETE /api/admin/card-fees/{fee_id} - 200 OK response
Admin Rates page shows separate swap rates section with HTG→USD and USD→HTG swap rates
Admin Fees page shows card withdrawal fees by limit section
Admin Users page shows client management with stats: 6 Total Kliyan, 2 KYC Verifye, 4 KYC An Atant, 0 Bloke
Admin sidebar items in Kreyòl: Tablo bò, Itilizatè, Frè, To chanj, Paramèt
Theme toggle changes background color and applies dark class to HTML element
All admin navigation working correctly through sidebar menu
User list shows Client ID, Name, Email, KYC status, USD/HTG balances, Status, Actions
Search functionality in admin users: 'Chèche pa imèl, non oswa ID...'
Haitian Creole interface throughout: Jesyon Kliyan, Total Kliyan, KYC Verifye, Bloke, etc.
Admin login with graciaemmanuel509@gmail.com / Admin123! working correctly
Backend API endpoints all returning proper status codes (100% success rate)

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all features working correctly including logo, theme toggle, dashboard, admin pages)
